This is Counter Strike.

My favorite game on Steam of all time. This has remained a staple for years and can bring endless joy and frustration. Other games come and go but CS:GO remains. Over 600 hours spent, whew. No other FPS has a shooting dynamic that matches.

Still hate having to pay for good skins and paying for keys to unlock them though.
